metadata.description:
"Sorry — I know you must've been lonely.
Don't worry.
I won't keep you waiting long...""

Maruyama, Nagasaki's pleasure district —
where the music of shamisens mingles with the language of foreign lands.
From artist Kan Takahama comes a tale of love and death:
a beautiful courtesan,
a man on his deathbed,
and their secret past..."
metadata.name: Flight of the Butterflies
